comments.message: Hi Starbucks, am i able to get it today even though its the last day?
Starbucks doesn't put banners or display any info about this promotion. They don't even tell you there's a 1 for 1 when you order. Why hide ?
This advertisement is misleading. Staff at Bugis junction is unhelpful  n have an unpleasant experience.

Hi Starbucks Singapore. I had an unpleasant experience at Starbucks Reserve (United Sq) this morning around 1:30am (Sunday 16 July 2017). It's regarding a customer harassing customers in the store. 

There was this lady who was lying down on 2 sofas to sleep. She had a luggage bag beside her. I do not know her or met her previously. I was sitting on table slightly further away from her. 

When she woke up from her sleep, she asked me if I can give her money so she can buy a drink in Starbucks. I politely declined. For reasons unknown to me, she just went ballistic. She started spewing expletives at me. This went on for a couple minutes. I just kept quiet and ignore her. She then went to approach the other customers asking for the same. Everyone that was being asked turned her down. I spoke to the barista regarding this incident and she told me this lady was there the previous day and also spewed expletives at one of the barista. 

This lady clearly needs help. I was just minding my own business enjoying my drink at Starbucks and did not do anything to provoke such a reaction, e.g. taking photos or videos of her. I also did not find a need to do so during and after this incident.

This whole incident is captured in your store's CCTV. You may review the videos to verify the accuracy of my account of this incident. 

Needless to say, my weekend mood was spoiled. I have been a regular customer at this Starbucks Reserve even before it was renovated and this is the first time I am encountering such a bad experience. I packed up immediately and left.

I have two questions. What can Starbucks do to minimise such episodes from happening in their stores? How long does Starbucks keep a record of the CCTV recordings as evidence in the event a customer is being assaulted by another and a police report is being made?

Thank you.
The One for one is unlimited or just once ?

I used the one for one, why cannot i use my 60 stars at the same time? One for one means that i only need to pay for one drink, and I thought I could use my one free drink for that so that in results i get 2 drinks

Dear Starbucks

Can you possibly make this promotion easier? I lost several minutes of my life earlier while 2 of you poor baristas had to try to explain the concept of screenshots to the 2 fools in front of me who kept just waving this post at them saying they can't pause gifs. 
Your staff deserve medals for all the stupid they have to deal with.

Thanks

I am disappointed that despite ordering and paying for 2 acai berry yoghurt drinks with my Starbucks card yesterday at the Clarke Quay outlet (Chk 5090) at 7.26pm, your barista did not tell me the new flavour is also available for one-for one! I was under the impression that new flavours don't count. My colleague and I are both upset when we learnt today that we could have enjoyed the drinks for half the expense yesterday. It's a small thing but we were nonetheless disappointed by this brand encounter, especially when we are both Starbucks members. ;-(

We had topped up and ordered our drinks with our members card! Why is it that the barista at the counter not inform us of this 1-for-1 promotion? Even your msg by SMS to members about this promotion were only received this morning. We totally didn't know there was a promotion going on.

13.post_text:
“I probably come to Starbucks 2 to 3 times a week, if my schedules allow it. I normally get something sweet, along with my Latte – treat myself to a donut or a muffin. It’s my little relaxation window. Coffee for myself and a relaxing time; so long as the baby is behaving, like he is now.” - Abigail 

Celebrating 20 years in Singapore, hear real stories from the Starbucks community. Tag your Starbucks story with @starbuckssg on Instagram.

20.post_text:
Frappuccino Frenzy is on! 

Every reaction to this post will bring you one step closer to the details. More reactions = Quicker access. Flash this in stores to enjoy offer. 

#FreeFrappuccinos #YesPlease

comments.message: First 10 customers to flash this (at each store), will receive a free Tall-sized Frappuccino. If you're not one of the first 10, you can still enjoy a 1-for-1 Venti-sized Frappuccino. 3-5pm, 15 Jun. Valid at all stores. :)

23.post_text:
Mark your calendars. It’s almost time for #FrappuccinoFrenzy. 🎉

Details will be revealed on our Facebook page on 15 June. Turn on post notifications so you don't miss out on all the Frappuccino goodness.

comments.message: Free (flow) all day for FB fans. Do that !

Me and colleagues visited your Capital Tower to enjoy the 1-for-1 today at 3.15pm. We thought it should be open to all frappe flavours but were told that the promotion was only for the two featured flavours - Irish Cream Coffee and Matcha Jelly. We ended up buying the two featured flavours to our disappointment.

It has just come to our attention that the promotion is for ALL flavours. The information provided is inaccurate and totally unacceptable. Please rectify this and please contact me. Otherwise I will write in again via email.
Thanks.
Update us on facebook

24.post_text:
"I come here (United Square) a lot, mostly before work. I really like the variety of brewing methods here. I’m from the Maldives and I’ve been here for 3 years now. There are only about 200+ Maldivians here. Singapore is a country that a lot of Maldivians look up to. Because I think the Singapore story has been a very successful story." - Munim

Celebrating 20 years in Singapore, hear real stories from the Starbucks community. Tag your Starbucks story with @starbuckssg on Instagram.
